data.eml:eml: Phase-contrast synchrotron microtomography reveals the internal morphology of a new fossil species of the Corticaria-sylvicola - group (Coleoptera: Latridiidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Reike, Hans-Peter, Bukejs, Andris, Arlt, Tobias, Kardjilov, Nikolay, Manke, Ingo (2017): Phase-contrast synchrotron microtomography reveals the internal morphology of a new fossil species of the Corticaria-sylvicola - group (Coleoptera: Latridiidae). Zootaxa 4242 (3): 578-590, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4242.3.9
